20110125192345.000|20110125192350.000|CC1|KILLING ALMOST 34,000, INJURING 
20110125192350.000|20110125192352.000|CC1|2 MILLION MORE.                 
20110125192352.000|20110125192354.000|CC1|AUTOMAKERS ARE DEVELOPING A     
20110125192354.000|20110125192359.000|CC1|TECHNOLOGY CALLED INTELLIDRAV   
20110125192359.000|20110125192400.000|CC1|THAT WILL WARN DRIVERS WHEN     
20110125192400.000|20110125192402.000|CC1|THEY'RE ABOUT TO CRASH.         
20110125192402.000|20110125192404.000|CC1|>> WE FEEL THAT THE PROGRAM     
20110125192404.000|20110125192406.000|CC1|FULLY IMPLEMENTED CAN SAVE UP TO
20110125192406.000|20110125192408.000|CC1|80% OF THE TRAFFIC ACCIDENTS FOR
20110125192408.000|20110125192409.000|CC1|NONIMPAIRED DRIVERS.            
20110125192409.000|20110125192410.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HERE'S HOW IT      
20110125192410.000|20110125192411.000|CC1|WORKS.                          
20110125192411.000|20110125192413.000|CC1|USING GPS TRANSMITTERS AND      
20110125192413.000|20110125192415.000|CC1|WI-FI, CARS CONSTANTLY SEND OUT 
20110125192415.000|20110125192418.000|CC1|SIGNALS WITH THEIR LOCATION AND 
20110125192418.000|20110125192418.000|CC1|SPEED.                          
20110125192418.000|20110125192420.000|CC1|SO A DRIVER ABOUT TO BE         
20110125192420.000|20110125192422.000|CC1|BROADSIDED AT AN INTERSECTION   
20110125192422.000|20110125192423.000|CC1|WOULD BE WARNED TO HIT THE      
20110125192423.000|20110125192425.000|CC1|BRAKES AND AVOID A COLLISION.   
20110125192425.000|20110125192428.000|CC1|>> WE WANT IT TO BE LIKE A      
20110125192428.000|20110125192430.000|CC1|VIGILANT CO-PILOT THEY HAVE WITH
20110125192430.000|20110125192430.000|CC1|THEM ALL THE TIME.              
20110125192430.000|20110125192433.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WE TESTED THE      
20110125192433.000|20110125192434.000|CC1|TECHNOLOGY WITH ENGINEERS FROM  
20110125192434.000|20110125192434.000|CC1|FORD.                           
20110125192434.000|20110125192436.000|CC1|FIRST, AT A BLIND INTERSECTION. 
20110125192436.000|20110125192437.000|CC1|>> LOOKS LIKE IT'S SAFE TO GO.  
20110125192437.000|20110125192439.000|CC1|SO AT THIS POINT I'M GOING TO
